timeline.bodyText: isn't it still called slave.jar or was that renamed?
timeline.author: timja

replies.bodyText:
Both names/URLs exist, this is the preferred one.

  
    
      jenkins/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/Slave.java
    
    
         Line 732
      in
      6254644
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private static final Set<String> ALLOWED_JNLPJARS_FILES = ImmutableSet.of("agent.jar", "slave.jar", "remoting.jar", "jenkins-cli.jar", "hudson-cli.jar");
